üìñ URN Format Guide

Object Storage Service URN:

urn:adsk.objects:os.object:{bucket}/{object}

Data Management URN:

urn:adsk.wipprod:dm.lineage:{item-id}

Base64 Encoding Rules:

  • Standard base64 encoding
  • Replace + with -
  • Replace / with _
  • Remove padding = characters
